title: Turn links into hyperlinks
body: In some text views, links should be hyperlinks (see https://stackoverflow.com/questions/9852184/android-textview-hyperlink for how).

title: Text to be corrected
body:
In file Antikythera-Simulation/Antikythera/res/values/strings.xml there is an error in the text in about_text1:
"It was discovered in 1900 an ancient mechanism was found". I don't know how the sentence is supposed to be, would be nice if corrected.
